steps.name: I navigate to patient grid

elements.name: Add Recommended Billable Assessment with all fields

steps.name: I search Danial722, Hack722 using global search
I verify patient is selected
I click on Assessment tab
I click on Assessment Add button
I click on Recommended Assessment tab to add assessment
I should see Cancel, Save & Close and Save buttons available and functional
I should see the Questionaire is loaded against relevant assessment
I should see question removing cross sign available and functional
I enter HTN-1 in assessment title field
I enter 893 in assessment CPTCode field
I enter chronic disease in assessment comment field
I enter answer Yes to question 1 in RecommendedAssessment
I enter answer Most of the time to question 2 in RecommendedAssessment
I enter answer All of the time to question 3 in RecommendedAssessment
I enter answer No to question 4 in RecommendedAssessment
I enter answer Yes to question 5 in RecommendedAssessment
I click on Save button to save assessment
I should see success message for added assessment
I click on Save and Close button to save assessment
I should see success message for added assessment
I should see Edit button available and functional
I should see the newly added HTN-1 and Yes and 893 for assessment on grid
I should see HTN-1 and current system Date and No of Q Ans and Yes and Most of the time and All of the time and No and Yes and chronic disease for assessment in the right pan
I navigate to patient grid

elements.name: Test Cancel button feature in Recommended Assessment

steps.name: I search Danial722, Hack722 using global search
I verify patient is selected
I click on Assessment tab
I click on Assessment Add button
I click on Recommended Assessment tab to add assessment
I should see Cancel, Save & Close and Save buttons available and functional
I should see the Questionaire is loaded against relevant assessment
I should see question removing cross sign available and functional
I enter HTN-1 in assessment title field
I enter 893 in assessment CPTCode field
I enter chronic desease in assessment comment field
I click on Cancel button to cancel the saved assessment
I should not see the canceled assessment present on the grid
I navigate to patient grid

elements.name: Add Billable Assessment with Other Assessment Templates

steps.name: I search Blake, Arnold using global search
I verify patient is selected
I click on Assessment tab
I click on Assessment Add button
I click on Other Assessment Templates tab to add Assessment
I select check box of Asthma Billable Assessment
I click on Proceed button to save assessment template
I should see Cancel, Save & Close and Save buttons available and functional
I should see the Questionaire is loaded against relevant assessment
I should see question removing cross sign available and functional
I enter Asthma Assessment-2 in assessment title field
I enter 689 in assessment CPTCode field
I enter Asthma assessment in assessment comment field
I enter answer Yes to question 1
I enter answer Yes to question 2
I enter answer Yes to question 3
I enter answer No to question 4
I enter answer Yes to question 5
I click on Save button to save assessment
I should see success message for added assessment
I click on Save and Close button to save assessment
I should see success message for added assessment
I should see Edit button available and functional
I should see the newly added Asthma Assessment-2 and Yes and 689 for assessment on grid
I should see Asthma Assessment-2 and current system Date and No of Q Ans and Yes and Yes and Yes and No and Yes and Asthma assessment for assessment in the right pan
I navigate to patient grid

elements.name: Add Non Billable Assessment with Other Assessment Templates

steps.name: I search Blake, Arnold using global search
I verify patient is selected
I click on Assessment tab
I click on Assessment Add button
I click on Other Assessment Templates tab to add Assessment
I select check box of Asthma Billable Assessment
I click on Proceed button to save assessment template
I should see Cancel, Save & Close and Save buttons available and functional
I should see the Questionaire is loaded against relevant assessment
I should see question removing cross sign available and functional
I enter type of assessment as non billable
I enter Asthma Assessment-nonbillable in assessment title field
I enter Asthma assessment in assessment comment field
I enter answer Yes to question 1
I enter answer Yes to question 2
I enter answer Yes to question 3
I enter answer No to question 4
I enter answer Yes to question 5
I click on Save button to save assessment
I should see success message for added assessment
I click on Save and Close button to save assessment
I should see success message for added assessment
I should see Edit button available and functional
I should see the newly added Asthma Assessment-nonbillable and No and  for assessment on grid
I should see Asthma Assessment-nonbillable and current system Date and No of Q Ans and Yes and Yes and Yes and No and Yes and Asthma assessment for assessment in the right pan
I navigate to patient grid

elements.name: Add in Custom Assessment with all fields

steps.name: I search Blake, Arnold using global search
I click on Assessment tab
I click on Assessment Add button
I click on Custom Assessment tab to add Assessment
I should see Cancel, Save & Close and Save buttons available and functional
I enter Covid Assessment in assessment title field
I enter Yes in assessment billable type field
I enter 789 in assessment CPTCode field

I enter DO KIDS NEED A COVID-19 VACCINE? Yes CAN ANTIBODY TESTS SHOW IF A COVID-19 VACCINE IS WORKING? Yes IF IVE HAD COVID-19, DO I REALLY NEED THE VACCINE? No DO WE NEED BOOSTER DOSES? Yes DO COVID-19 VACCINES AFFECT FERTILITY OR PERIODS? Yes in assessment comment field

arguments.val: DO KIDS NEED A COVID-19 VACCINE? Yes CAN ANTIBODY TESTS SHOW IF A COVID-19 VACCINE IS WORKING? Yes IF IVE HAD COVID-19, DO I REALLY NEED THE VACCINE? No DO WE NEED BOOSTER DOSES? Yes DO COVID-19 VACCINES AFFECT FERTILITY OR PERIODS? Yes

steps.name: I click on Save button to save assessment
I should see success message for added assessment
I click on Save and Close button to save assessment
I should see success message for added assessment
I should see Edit button available and functional
I should see the newly added Covid Assessment and Yes and 789 for assessment on grid
I navigate to patient grid

elements.name: Add Custom Assessment with all fields

steps.name: I search Blake, Arnold using global search

I click on Assessment tab

I click on Based on Previous Assessment tab to add Assessment

I enter 758 in assessment CPTCode field
I enter Take Steam dailly in assessment comment field
I click on Save button to save assessment
I should see success message for added assessment
I click on Save and Close button to save assessment
I should see success message for added assessment
I should see Edit button available and functional

I search Blake, Arnold using global search
I verify patient is selected
I click on Assessment tab
I click on Assessment Compare button
I click on assessment to compare with other assessment
I should see the name of assessment1
I should see the date at which assessment1 is created
I should see the name of assessment2
I should see the date at which assessment2 is created
I should see stop compare button of assessment
I click on stop compare button of assessment
